name: Trump Jumper
description:
Trump Jumper is a simple platformer game.

Help Trump to be a President by collecting the coins and reaching the American Flag.

Instructions:

- Avoid touching the temporary ground 6 times, if you touched it 6 times it will be destroyed.

- Avoid The danger wheels when you collect the coins.

- The American Flag will not appear until you collect 10 coins.

How to Play:

⬅You can play this game by using the arrow keys➡

1 - Left Arrow = Move the player to the left.

2 - Right Arrow = Move the player to the right.

3 - Down Arrow = Move the player to Down.

4 - Use Spacebar to jump.

Currently, the game contains 1 level, I think I will add more levels later if I have more time.

I created this game just for fun. 😅

The game was made with Gdevelop game engine. 

You can also download the source code by clicking on Download now button.

-Thank you for visiting.
